content: Arcc Event Investments Forex (FX) Dividends Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 May 2019Do dividends exist for FOREX trading?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 09 May 2019Forex is trading with currency pairs. Currency (like SGD) do not pay out dividends because these are not companies generating revenue to payout.However, trading in forex will involve swap rates. You will notice that sometimes you get credited or debited some from your account balance. This is because holding currencies overnight incur interest.0 comments1
